message.content:
{"id": "17894", 
"title": "Bug 17894: Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults", 
"description": "", 
"OB": "The Open Mode preference is not being reset to its default value of Double Click and the checkboxes are not being cleared when the 'Restore Defaults' button is clicked in the Workbench preferences.", 
"EB": "After clicking the 'Restore Defaults' button in the Workbench preferences, the Open Mode preference should revert to Double Click and the checkboxes should be cleared.", 
"SR": "1. Open Build 20020521.\n2. Go to the Workbench preferences.\n3. Change the Open Mode to Single Click and select both checkboxes.\n4. Click the 'Restore Defaults' button.\nExpected Result: The 'Open Mode' preference should revert to Double Click and both checkboxes should be cleared."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '17894', 'title': 'Bug 17894Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Build 20020521 go to Workbench prefs change Open Mode to Single Click and select both checkboxes Restore Defaults no change to theseIt should revert to Double Click and clear both checkboxes ', 'SR': 'Build 20020521 go to Workbench prefs change Open Mode to Single Click and select both checkboxes Restore Defaults no change to theseIt should revert to Double Click and clear both checkboxes '}
